question: If person keeps a fast on 10th Of Muharram and due to some inconvienience and difficulties while fasting he ignores Sawm of 11th Muharram. What is the Sharee'ah ruling. Jazak Allah.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

The purpose of fasting a day before or after the 10th Muharram is to avoid
imitating the Jews who fast only on the 10th of Muharram. If one is unable
to keep the second fast due to circumstances, he will be excused.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
